overview: DARK ANGELS is a black indie film written, produced, and directed by David Wadley. Angela has to choose between her toxic, abusive husband and the baby she has on the way. Their world is full of sex, drugs, money, and power, with violence an ever-present threat. On the mean streets of Atlanta, the pregnant mother finds that only spiritual awareness can help her escape the madness. - Available on Prime Video
title: Dark Angels
